code: import React from'react';import styles from'./PrivacyPolicy.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PrivacyPolicy(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.container,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.card,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Privacy Policy"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.para,children:"- No Tracking or Storage: We don\u2019t store scanned URLs, personal info, or your IP address \u2014 ever."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.para,children:"- Temporary Scans: Website scans happen in a secure, sandboxed session, then data is immediately discarded."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.para,children:"- No Cookies, No Selling: We don\u2019t use cookies, and never sell or share data with third parties."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.para,children:"- Minimal Data: The only data we collect is just enough to generate the visual report \u2014 and it's not saved."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.para,children:"- Contact Info Use: If you contact us, we use your info only to reply, not for anything else."})]})});}export default PrivacyPolicy;
